price: 我确已赏赐穆萨和哈伦证据和光明，以及敬畏者的教诲；
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَا مُوسَىٰ وَهَٰرُونَ ٱلۡفُرۡقَانَ وَضِيَآءٗ وَذِكۡرٗا لِّلۡمُتَّقِينَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: walaqad ātaynā mūsā wahārūna al-fur'qāna waḍiyāan wadhik'ran lil'muttaqīna
